detail_desc: Padded puffer gilet with a stand-up collar, wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal welt pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a hood with a wide, fine-knit drawstring.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a hood with a wide, fine-knit drawstring.

Boiler suit in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed zip down the front and a yoke front and back. Long sleeves, chest, front and back pockets, and wide elastication at the waist. The cotton content of the boiler suit is partly recycled.
Smartphone case in hard plastic with an adjustable fabric lanyard.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with long puff sleeves. Opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back of the skirt. Unlined.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Boots in imitation leather with a tab and metal buckle on the shaft, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the shoulder seams. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a low-cut skirt with gathers to create volume and soft draping.
Flared, pleated, calf-length skirt in airy polyester with a high waist, concealed zip in one side seam and a soft belt with a metal buckle and eyelets.
Metal studs and ear cuffs in various designs. One snake-shaped stud with a cuff at one end. The zinc in the metal is recycled.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of a hand decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with rhinestone-decorated text.
Thin metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads and cloud-shaped pendants with colourful glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Metal hoop earrings, some plain and some with a textured finish. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon. Deep V-neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and a yoke with elastication and gathers at the top and at the back. Long dolman sleeves and an asymmetric seam with a drawstring at the waist. Flared skirt with a high slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings. Two pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones and have pendants in different designs.
Metal earrings in the shape of flowers and leaves decorated with rhinestones.
Set with six ear cuffs and a pair of hoop earrings in metal. The earrings and four of the ear cuffs are decorated with glass rhinestones.

Jacket in imitation leather with a collar, zip down the front, jetted front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with rainbow-shaped pendants decorated with colourful glass rhinestones. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Metal-chain bracelet with fixed pendants that have different motifs. Adjustable length.
A pair of wide metal hoop earrings with a textured finish.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, two with a rhinestone-decorated pendant. Adjustable length.
Necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have pendants. Adjustable length.
Thin metal chain necklace with a rectangular pendant. Adjustable length. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.

Small metal studs in the shape of letters, numbers, shapes and objects. Some studs are decorated with glass rhinestones, some can be worn as a pair and others individually. The zinc content of the studs is recycled.
Metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a rainbow decorated with rhinestones. Adjustable length.
Longer, metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a horseshoe decorated with rhinestones. Adjustable length.
A pair of earrings in a three-part hoop design made from steel and recycled zinc.
A pair of earrings in a three-part hoop design made from steel and recycled zinc.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones and one pair with a plastic bead and pendant.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.
Four pairs of metal ear cuffs, one pair decorated with plastic stones and one with glass rhinestones.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with pendants. Adjustable length.
Metal body chain that fastens around the neck and waist. Adjustable length.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the top. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Rhinestone-decorated metal hoop earrings in the shape of a snake’s head at the top.
Longer style, thin metal chain necklace with an adjustable fastener and a rhinestone-decorated pendant in the shape of an eye.
A pair of thin metal hoop earrings with a rhinestone-decorated pendant.
Fitted, turtleneck top in airy jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes with pendants, two of which are decorated with glass rhinestones.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover and a concealed zip in one side. High waist with concealed elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Recycled zinc ring in the shape of a snake encircling the finger. The snake’s head is decorated with glass rhinestones.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top, wide, raglan sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping, A-line skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, merino wool jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a gently rounded hem.
Small shopper in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with two metal chain handles, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top.

Short dress in soft imitation leather. Gentle A-line style with elbow-length balloon sleeves that have a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the hems. Concealed zip at the back and decorative seams at the front. Unlined.

Short dress in soft imitation leather. Gentle A-line style with elbow-length balloon sleeves that have a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the hems. Concealed zip at the back and decorative seams at the front. Unlined.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in a soft cotton blend with a glittery text print. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in a soft cotton blend with a glittery text print. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Stocking-stitched lapels and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Stocking-stitched lapels and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric with an overlocked hem. Regular waist with covered elastication. Unlined.

Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in twill with a zip down the front, wide shoulder straps and patch side pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist and a detachable fabric belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.

Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in twill with a zip down the front, wide shoulder straps and patch side pockets with a flap. Seam at the waist and a detachable fabric belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in soft imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, and wide, extra-long legs.
Shirt jacket in cotton twill. Relaxed fit with a collar, two-way zip down the front, yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a concealed fastener. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a soft knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication, a wide ribbed trim at the hem and a slit at the back. The polyester content of the skirt is recycled.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in jersey with a deep neckline at the back and horizontal ties at the back of the neck.

Hi-tops in glittery imitation leather with elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a small loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester, and patterned soles.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringed trims.
